message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm proposing a price of $1300000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1200000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $1350000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1250000. I'm willing to pay $1225000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1225000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $1325000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1200000.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1200000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $1300000 for the product.

Alice, I understand that we're close, but I'm still not willing to pay $1300000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm sticking to my original target of $1200000. I'm not willing to go any higher. Please consider my final offer of $1200000 for the product.

Bob, I understand that we're close, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1200000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $1275000 for the product. This is my final offer.
